IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO SUPPORT THE ACTIVITIES OF THE MARYLAND PUBLIC BROADCASTING COMMISSION (MPT)
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE FOUNDATION'S PURPOSE IS TO SUPPORT AND PROMOTE THE OBJECTIVES OF THE MARYLAND PUBLIC BROADCASTING COMMISSION (MPT) IN THE FOLLOWING WAYS: 1) TO FACILITATE FUND RAISING PROGRAMS AND CONTRIBUTIONS FROM PRIVATE SOURCES TO FOSTER AND PROMOTE THE GENERAL WELFARE OF MPT 2) TO PROMOTE, SPONSOR, AND IMPLEMENT EDUCATIONAL, SCIENTIFIC, CHARITABLE AND CULTURAL ACTIVITIES FOR THE BENEFIT OF MPT AND 3) TO ACCUMULATE AND PROVIDE FUNDS TO BE INVESTED AND TO UTILIZE THE PRINCIPAL AND INCOME THEREOF FOR ACTIVITIES THAT ENHANCE AND FURTHER THE MISSION OF MPT.
IRS990.Desc: SUPPORT GRANTS TO THE MARYLAND PUBLIC BROADCASTING COMMISSION (MPT) AND GENERAL, PROGRAMMING AND MEMBERSHIP SUPPORT PROVIDED TO MPT

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TO SUPPORT MD PUBLIC BROADCASTING COMMISSION (MPT)
NET GAIN FROM PASS THROUGH ENTITY NOT INCLUDED IN FINANCIAL STATEMENTS 395.

THE FOUNDATION DOES NOT AWARD GRANTS, THEREFORE IT DOES NOT MONITOR GRANT FUNDS. RATHER IT PAYS MONEY TO ASSIST THE ABOVE LISTED RELATED ORGANIZATION IN REACHING ITS OBJECTIVES LISTED ON FORM 990 PART III, LINE 1.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEWS AND APPROVES FORM 990 BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION REQUIRES ALL BOARD MEMBERS TO SUBMIT A SIGNED STATEMENT EACH YEAR STATING THEY HAVE NO INTEREST IN CORPORATIONS DOING BUSINESS WITH THE FOUNDATION AND THESE ARE MONITORED BY MANAGEMENT TO ASSURE THERE IS NO CONFLICT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FOUNDATION DIRECTORS AND OFFICERS ARE NOT PAID POSITIONS. ONLY MARKETING STAFF ARE PAID.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST AND THROUGH GUIDESTAR.
NET INCOME FROM PASS THROUGH ENTITY NOT INCLUDED IN FINANCIAL STATMENTS. -395.
THERE HAS BEEN NO CHANGE TO THE OVERSIGHT PROCESS.
